Welcome to my Website


I am a novice programmer and a life-time learner. I mainly work on NLP, machine learning and full-stack end-to-end products. My hobbies include learning the startup culture, playing/watching football and cricket. Working remotely gives me that extra time to tinker around with what I love. I try to write sometimes, especially to keep track of my learnings.

Teamcoda, the company I work for, is a collection of wonderful developers from diverse backgrounds. We are trying to create products using the best and well tested methods. I mainly specialize on Python, Django, Flask, Pandas, Angular, NestJS with some machine learning here and there.

If you think I can help you in any of your software product that touches full-stack, machine learning or is data-intensive, I am easy to find. Just reach me out to one of the networks below. In case you want to know more about my background, hereâ€™s my CV.
